responsibilities: Design and maintain Maven’s data transformation and analytics infrastructure to support Revenue Operations, Finance, and Go-to-Market (GTM) teams.
Build tools to automate enrollment forecasts, integrating key inputs from Customer Success, Member Growth Marketing (MGM), and Strategic Finance teams.
Partner with the GTM Architect, Salesforce Admin, and account leaders to design and develop data structures for financial and GTM reporting.
Cleanse and integrate historical datasets while implementing data governance to ensure accuracy and consistency (primarily using SQL and Python).
Develop an understanding of Salesforce to effectively structure and utilize data, enabling comprehensive reporting on the deal lifecycle—from lead generation to revenue recognition.
Drive operational efficiency by identifying areas for process improvement and recommending highly scalable solutions.
Act as a bridge between Revenue Operations, Product, Finance, Business Intelligence, and Engineering teams to optimize data structures and maximize actionable insights.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on data transformation, analytics infrastructure, and collaboration with various teams to optimize data structures and reporting. There is no mention of working with language models or tasks related to fine-tuning or customizing them for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities are more aligned with data engineering and analytics rather than language model development.
